full_summary:
# Digital Enforcement: Technology and Tool Insights Establishment Project

### Project Overview
The Innovation, Science and Economic Development (ISED) is seeking the services of a consultant to provide advice and assistance in the establishment of the Technology and Tool Insights Unit within the Digital Evidence Division (DED). The consultant will provide recommendations on specific areas related to the structure, staffing, and recruitment of technologists, as well as the roles and responsibilities between DED, enforcement branches, and corporate service digital enforcement services.

### Tender Details
* **Tender Reference Number:** cb-294-46823274
* **Solicitation Number:** ISED-209533
* **Publication Date:** January 23, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** February 7, 2024, at 2:00 PM (EST)
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Innovation, Science and Economic Development (ISED)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 50, Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0H9, Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Nathalie Marcoux
	+ Email: nathalie.marcoux@ised-isde.gc.ca
	+ Phone: 343572-8798

### Tender Requirements
The consultant will be responsible for providing written recommendations on the following areas:

* Structure, staffing, and recruitment of technologists within the Technology and Tool Insights Unit
* Assessment of skills required of substantive employees and areas of expertise to be introduced through consultant engagement
* Approaches to learning and development of DED technologists and Bureau digital and technical experts
* Roles and responsibilities between DED, enforcement branches, and corporate service digital enforcement services
* Development of procedural best practices for the Technology and Tool Insights Unit
* Identification of efficiencies and innovations that can be made to Bureau digital and technology experts implicated in the digital evidence pipeline
* Review of current policies and procedures supporting investigators' ability to conduct open-source intelligence (OSINT) and protect the integrity of digital evidence
* Analysis of emerging technologies and new investigative digital tools
* Participation in meetings with Bureau representatives as required

### Tender Documents and Contract Award
Please visit the following link to access the tender document: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30100/acan-ised-209533.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30100/acan-ised-209533.pdf
